name: Hell on Earth (Xisip)
description:
GAME MADE FOR #DevSquadJam

Defend your land from demons comming from another world!!

Instructions

Summon units clicking on their portrait with the money you generate over time or killing enemies, go through the portal to destroy the source of all those demons!

Be carefull not to be overun! If your caste loses all the hp you will lose.

Clicking on the arrow will show you the demon world and what are they doing there, clicking it again will return you to your lands.

My interpretation of the theme was literally 2 worlds connected, in this case the human world and the demon world.

Hope you like it!
